name: procprocprocproc
description:
procprocprocproc (proc^4) is a minimal, procedurally generated VR  made with A-Frame.

Work in progress, made for Procjam 2019.

Why the name "procprocprocproc" ("proc"^4)?

  • the environment is a procedurally generated maze
  • the textures are procedurally generated shaders
  • the sound is procedurally generated
  • the monsters are procedurally generated

... all from a common random seed.

HEALTH  WARNING: PHOTOSENSITIVITY/EPILEPSY SEIZURES

Live at https://i3games.github.io/proc-4/.

Code at https://github.com/i3games/proc-4.
